articles.content: In the first three months of this year, 25 companies listed their shares in London, raising more than £7billion between them. Many of these newly floated firms have done pretty well. Dr Martens' shar… [+6792 chars]

articles.title: Boris Johnson to open up international travel? What the PM is likely to say on Easter Monday - The Independent
